Are you a telemarketer? I don't have time for your shit. I have to go to Best Buy in an hour to buy some gift cards for a Nigerian Prince.
I dont know what the hell you're talking about, son

anyways...
Can I ask you something?
Answer me this.
By the way...
I gotta ask...
Hey...
Humor me real quick
I didn't fight in the war to take shit from you

Kids these days...

You give me hope for the next generation
If only every young American was just like you, then I wouldn't worry so much

You're good-natured. That's hard to come by nowadays
